This one look pretty basic to me, yet I will appreciate any kind of help.
I am trying to use an extension of TestCase to perform a test that combine
multiple assertion in a row.
When one of the assertion failed an AssertionFailedError is thrown and my
test fails.
What I really want is to try all assertion regardless to their success.
Can U help??, Guy
subject: Multiple assertions in one TestCase
